challenges.title: Solve for Health & Life Sciences with Gemma - The hackathon
challenges.description: NeuroGem – Personalized Cognitive Health Monitoring using On-Device Gemma/MedGemma. A mobile-first, offline-capable tool that uses on-device Gemma/MedGemma models to monitor daily cognitive patterns from user voice or text input, evaluating semantic drift, linguistic complexity, and memory markers over time.

challenges.title: HACKUPC 2024
challenges.description: Automated brain MRI segmentation using deep learning approaches. Developed innovative solutions for medical image processing.
challenges.organizer: The Faculty of Informatics of Barcelona (FIB), Polytechnic University of Catalonia (UPC), Spain

challenges.title: Datathon IA4care
challenges.description: Automated 3D segmentation of mouse brain histological images. Comparative Analysis for Hippocampus Segmentation in Mouse Brain using advanced AI techniques.
challenges.organizer: Eseo - Grande School D'ingénieurs, University of Burgundy, Dijon, France

challenges.title: CT Image Registration Challenge
challenges.description: 3D volume image registering CT lung scans of COPD patients. Focused on accurate alignment and analysis of pulmonary imaging data.

challenges.title: bitsxlaMarató 2023
challenges.description: AI-based solution for respiratory illnesses and cancer diagnostics. Collaborated with teams to develop innovative healthcare solutions.
challenges.organizer: Faculty of Informatics of Barcelona (FIB), Barcelona Supercomputing Center (BSC), Catalonia, Spain

challenges.title: Lleidahack, HackEPS 2023
challenges.description: AI-based solution for NLP (Natural Language Processing) and disease diagnostics. Built intelligent systems for healthcare applications.
challenges.organizer: Polytechnic School of the University of Lleida, Spain

challenges.title: Classification Challenge
challenges.description: Alzheimer's disease classification using MRIs and gene expression data. Applied machine learning techniques for medical diagnosis.

challenges.title: Quazi Azher Ali SAARC Programming Contest
challenges.description: Problem solving - Data Structures and Algorithms. Competed in algorithmic challenges and optimization problems.
